data.name: Car Quest Deluxe
data.detailed_description:
GET YOUR CUSTOM PLATE!


Can you find all the golden wheels and unlock the "Unlimited Rocket" car? Everyone who does gets a custom in-game license plate with your world ranking. Will you be #1?!


About the Game



Hit the road to epic adventure in Car Quest Deluxe: drive, collect, explore, solve, discover.



Buckle-up for an epic road trip through a colorful world of puzzles and adventure. Use driving skills and puzzle solving abilities to find missing artifacts and piece together the broken world of Blocktaria.



DRIVE everywhere: it's like your favorite kart racing and platforming puzzle adventure game all wrapped up into one.



COLLECT batteries to unlock portals.



FIND 100+ artifacts to unlock new realms and paths on the road to discovery.



EXPLORE more than 15 unique visually striking realms.



SOLVE physical puzzles, push obstructions, jump off ramps, or skillfully navigate challenging mazes.



DISCOVER the secrets of Blocktaria and recover the lost memories of your helpful but very forgetful guide, Lord Blockstar. What is his story? What secrets will be revealed?



DELUXE version comes with eight new cars to unlock, each with their own unique ability: x2 Battery, Super Boost, Froggy, Higher Torque, Battery Rocket, Nitro, Spider and Unlimited Rocket. Which will be your favourite?

Featuring:

- Put your driving skills and puzzle solving abilities to the test
- No damage, no time limits
- Intriguing story to discover
- Soothing visuals and soundtrack

The Steam version of Car Quest has been brought to you by the awesome Car Quest player community! Special thanks to @SolarPellets for all the hard work on the PC port and also playtesters @CtrlXthroat, @BaronBishop, @HotCocoa.

data.short_description: Hit the road to epic adventure in Car Quest Deluxe: drive, collect, explore, solve, discover.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
